document_data.name: Watchful Wheels Wagons & Gear
document_data.mainbody: '''Watchful Wheels Wagons & Gear''' was a business in the city of [[Tantras]] in [[the Vast]] around [[1367 DR]]. It stood on Seaspray Street. [[Lightal Barnshyn]] worked there to sponsor and outfit caravans.
